data.name: Luffytype
data.description: Luffytype is a simple user-friendly typing practise web app designed to help you improve your typing speed and accuracy in a fun and interactive way

data.name: Space Shooter
data.description: A single player 2D top-down space shooting game built with C++ and Simple and Fast Multimedia Library (SFML)

data.name: Sorting Visualizer
data.description: C++ program to visualize sorting algorithms, providing insights into their efficiency and functioning. It utilizes Simple and Fast Multimedia Library (SFML) for windowing and 2D graphics

data.name: ChatterBox
data.description: ChatterBox is a simple web relay chat application designed for real-time communication, built with Socket.io, with a responsive and visually appealing user interface
